CustomField.description: Controls if LogEntryEvent__e platform events are transformed & stored in the custom objects Log__c and LogEntry__c (when IsSavingEnabled__c == true).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Controls if LogEntryEvent__e platform events are transformed & stored in the custom objects Log__c and LogEntry__c (when IsSavingEnabled__c == true).
CustomField.label: DEPRECATED: Store Platform Events
